channel.title: Camper on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Camper on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Motor Home
item.description: Called into Thompson Leisure Yesterday just to look, guess what happened when we went back today. {{ more }} After much consideration we decided on a Elddis Autoquest 115 SIG 6469 A much smaller vehicle than we had envisaged at the start of our quest, however this allows us to try a Motor home at at more reasonable price with the potential to upgrade later. The concern now is if Lotti approves.
